frontMatter.title: Technology Revamp/Migration Plan
frontMatter.metaDescription: A roadmap to move to better technologies, to facilitate a rapid response process, while boosting security, availability, performance, and agility.

checklist.question: Have you identified the requirement for technology revamp/migration?
checklist.expectation: Determine technical, time, and financial requirements.

checklist.question: Have you identified the risks of technology revamp/migration?
checklist.expectation: Provide an assessment of cost, duration, commitment from stakeholders, privacy-related risks.

checklist.question: Have you identified the most optimized way?
checklist.expectation: Map and analyze these high prioritized features and pain-points with new product design.

checklist.question: Have you assessed the impact?
checklist.expectation: Once the update is completed, assess the impact and cost.
